Projects

  • By Skill

Fullstack vue news




A Node.js/Vue.js Full Stack application which retrieves and displays news feeds from various sources. Used MongoDB and loopback to store feed sources and scraped news. Vue with Vuetify material components for the UI. Vuex for client side application state management.

Info

Fullstack react games




Full Stack React application demo where you can play classic games powered by HTML5 Canvas. Integrated with Auth0 for secure authentication and graphql database to store data.

Info

Axs Trading Platform




Algorithmic trading application integrated with Oanda API for stocks/comodities/forex trading. Developing modules for a news feed, portfolio manager/optimiser, strategy designer UI, price forecaster and signal generator, order management system.

Info

FSBTech Enterprise SaaS




Lead the development of a bespoke enterprise SaaS product for FSB Tech. Custodian Backoffice is being used by many large global organisations in the gaming/casino sector. Took ownership of entire SDLC and worked with cross functional teams to deliver a quality frontend solution. Utilised ExtJS and MVVM architecture to create application modules.

Info

Rental Map




A single-page web application, built using the Knockout framework, that displays a Google Map of an area and various points of interest. Users can search all included landmarks and, when selected, additional information about a landmark is presented from the Google Places and Zoopla API. Available properties are listed on a side panel.

Info

Feed Reader Testing




Wrote comprehensive unit tests, using the Jasmine testing framework, for an RSS Feed Reader application that uses Google’s RSS API.

Info

HTML5 Arcade Game




An HTML5 Canvas powered video game, developed using the best practices in Object Oriented JavaScript.

Info

Web Application Performance Optimization




Optimized an inefficient web application’s JavaScript, CSS and assets delivery, ensuring it runs at 60fps and achieves a PageSpeed score of at least 90.

Analysed critical rendering path and frame rate to minimize page loading time and maek the page jank free.

Info

HDF REST Server




A RESTful interface to view/traverse contents of HDF5 data stores. Providing you the ability to query your data store using a REST API.
